title: bug with fragment of keys
body: i was playing and i have earn 3 fragement key in the day. and i go to open a chest and i have one fragment key ??????!!!! Help pls {{champion:122}}

replies.body: Since you feel your key fragments are missing, I recommend reaching out to our account specialists by [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) We'll be able to look into this further and let you know what happened that way.
